TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BamlLocalizabilityResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: Resuelve valores traducibles de clases y propiedades de XAML binario (BAML).

span.span: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in binary XAML (BAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks está usando el con el fin de resolver los valores de localizabilidad para clases y propiedades en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]. is used by the in order to resolve localizability settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]. Se llama a la resolución tanto en el momento de la extracción de recursos, así como cuando localiza [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] se actualiza.The resolver is called both at the time of resource extraction as well as when localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated. En el momento de la extracción de recursos (), la resolución:At the time of resource extraction (), the resolver: - Proporciona para clases y propiedades en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] cuando el construye los recursos localizables.Provides for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] when the is constructing localizable resources. - Proporciona elementos de preferencias de formato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] por lo que los elementos tienen el formato de etiquetas en línea.Provides formatting preferences for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] so elements are formatted as inline tags. AT localizado de la hora a la que [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] se actualiza (), la resolución:At the time at which localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated (), the resolver: - Se resuelve en las clases de etiquetas de formato.Resolves formatting tags back into classes. - Resuelve el nombre del ensamblado que contiene la definición de clase.Resolves the name of the assembly that contains class definition. - es una subclase de una clase interna que realiza los aspectos prácticos de las funciones de clase para . is subclassed by an internal class that performs the practical aspects of the class functions for .

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: BamlLocalizabilityResolver();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability (string assembly, string className);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability GetElementLocalizability(string assembly, string className) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetElementLocalizability (assembly As String, className As String) As ElementLocalizability
public: abstract System::Windows::Markup::Localizer::ElementLocalizability ^ GetElementLocalizability(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ className);
abstract member GetElementLocalizability : string * string -> System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability

param.name: assembly
param.span: Nombre completo del ensamblado que contiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] que se va a traducir.

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.

param.name: className
param.span: Nombre completo de la clase del elemento para el que desea recuperar información de localizabilidad.

span.span: The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si se puede traducir un tipo especificado de elemento y, en ese caso, si se le puede dar el formato insertado.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.

returns.span: Objeto que contiene información de localizabilidad para el ensamblado y el elemento especificados.

span.span: An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute GetPropertyLocalizability (string assembly, string className, string property);

abstract member GetPropertyLocalizability : string * string * string -> System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute

param.name: assembly
param.span: Nombre completo del ensamblado que contiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] que se va a traducir.

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.

param.name: className
param.span: Nombre completo de la clase del elemento para el que desea recuperar información de localizabilidad.

span.span: The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

param.name: property
param.span: Nombre de la propiedad para la que desea recuperar información de localizabilidad.

span.span: The name of the property that you want to retrieve localizability information for.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si se puede traducir una propiedad especificada de un tipo de elemento especificado.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified property of a specified type of element can be localized.

returns.span: Objeto que especifica si se puede traducir la propiedad y de qué manera.

span.span: An object that specifies whether and how the property can be localized.

summary.span: Devuelve el nombre completo del ensamblado que contiene la clase especificada.

span.span: Returns the full name of the assembly that contains the specified class.

returns.span: Nombre completo del ensamblado que contiene la clase.

span.span: The full name of the assembly that contains the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ResolveFormattingTagToClass (string formattingTag);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolveFormattingTagToClass(string formattingTag) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveFormattingTagToClass (formattingTag As String) As String
public: abstract System::String ^ ResolveFormattingTagToClass(System::String ^ formattingTag);
abstract member ResolveFormattingTagToClass : string -> string

summary.span: Devuelve el nombre de clase completo de una etiqueta [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] que no se ha encontrado en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

span.span: Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].

returns.span: Nombre completo de la clase asociada a la etiqueta.

span.span: The full class name associated with the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se llama cuando un o un equivalente está aplicando sustituciones a los recursos localizables.This method is called when a or an equivalent is applying substitutions to localizable resources. Si se encuentra una etiqueta de formato en las sustituciones, se llama a este método para resolver un nombre de clase de la etiqueta de formato.If a formatting tag is encountered in the substitutions, this method is called to resolve the formatting tag back to a class name.
